notes.title: Funding
notes.p: S.P. and P.D. acknowledge funding from the Zeiss Foundation, project “Eine virtuelle Werkstatt für die Digitalisierung in den Wissenschaften” (Durchbrüche 2018). B.I. and StS acknowledge funding by the German Research Foundation (DFG) within the Collaborative Research Center (CRC) 1127 ChemBioSys (SFB 1127, Project C07) and M.H. within the CRC 1076 AquaDiva (Project A06). K.L. acknowledges the funding by the Bundesministerium für Bildung und Forschung (BMBF) (Project 03ZZ0820A).
